Posts.Content: miss_sunshine wrote: I had a mastectomy last Thursday July 10th. Two days ago (on Tuesday), I started to experience increasing pain and today it is excruciating. When can I expect this pain to end? I have Tylenol # 3 but it does not really help much. I hope tonight that I will be able to sleep. Dx 2009, IDC, Stage IIA, Grade 3, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Surgery 2/24/2009 Lumpectomy: Left Chemotherapy 4/16/2009 AC + T (Taxol) Hormonal Therapy 8/17/2009 Targeted Therapy 8/17/2009 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Radiation Therapy 8/17/2009 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Post-mastectomy pain miss_sunshine juliaanna
